Articles.Content:
Show off your designs for using the otherwise impractical MK3 Cockpit. (Sorry if it's in the wrong forum, I'm new.)

My design:

Pelican MK1

Mass: 12.48 Tons

Part Count: 45

Top Speed: Haven't checked it yet.

It takes off at the end of the runway, but it turns great and handles well. I made it just today.

http://i.imgur.com/Gs6SuHJ.jpg' alt='Gs6SuHJ.jpg'>
